Content:
Hey Everyone,
I painted my fenders on my 2009 Honda Rebel and for some reason the bike won't ever try to start. I can get it to try starting up when I jump the relay wires but still won't start just trys to. When I removed the turns signals, I saw that the grounds were not connected so I went ahead and did that. I removed the grounds hoping that would be the problem but no luck. I have a new battery that reads 12.4V and tried replacing the relay. The only thing I can think of is a short somewhere in the wires but I'm no expert. Any help is much appreciated!

Thanks!

Title: Bike Wont Start After Fender Removed & Installed
